website_summaries.verdict: They get top marks for being stylish, soft, and for maintaining their shape throughout pregnancy.
pros: Soft, flexible maternity jeans that fit snug yet comfortably
Stand out for having a Spandex and cotton blend that maintains comfort and shape
cons: These jeans are somewhat more costly than their competitors, we found them to be well worth the price for their style and quality

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: I really love the cut of these pants. I ended up buying them in Cement, Black, & Coral. Beware, though, they run extremely small. I was 5'4", 105lbs, pre-pregnancy & finally ended up settling with a size Medium. Even then, I wasn't very comfortable in them towards the end of my pregnancy. Trust me, go at least two sizes up.
customer_reviews.author: Price6

customer_reviews.title: as I love this under-belly style
customer_reviews.text: I returned these. I have two other pairs of MA jeans, similar to this but denim, one in ankle length and one full length. They are favorites and I couldn't wait to receive this pair in red... but... the fit is awkward. They are a very thin fabric, and they sort of flare out around the ankle a little in a strange way. I debated a bit, but returned and found something similar, but much nicer looking, for less than half the price at a local store. Bummed, as I love this under-belly style.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Flattering and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I loved these. I wish I had bought them when I was pregnant! I actually got them postpartum to have something low that would fit me before I lost my baby weight. I needed something a little more snug. I will definitely get these when I am pregnant again and right away as they are so very flattering and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: skidali

customer_reviews.title: Strange fit
customer_reviews.text: I tried a sm (I am a size 4), md, and lg, and had to send back all three because they were too small, and finally the large was just too big in weird places! This was disappointing because they looked cute in the picture. Oh well!
customer_reviews.author: debimustard

customer_reviews.title: Tiny!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice fabric, but fits extremely small. I'm normally a 0 or an xs in all pants. I had to exhange these for medium and the band still put unpleasant pressure on my belly (at 5 months).
customer_reviews.author: m.euro

customer_reviews.title: Waistband so tight it's uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The band on the belly is so tight it's uncomfortable. I'm going to have to cut it to wear them. I'm a very small pregnant person & still found these so uncomfortable I regretted wearing them to work. The style was cute if only the waist band had more give.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Fit is super comfortable. Pants don't lose their shape throughout the day as bad as I thought they would. I used the size chart to determine which size to get and found other reviews and the chart very helpful. The color is slightly brighter than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: wiggle88

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The fit is good but the fabric attracts lint. The pants are warm and suitable for the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Feels somewhat small in the waist area and feels like it may fall down but other that it looks ...
customer_reviews.text: Feels somewhat small in the waist area and feels like it may fall down but other that it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Runs small but worth sizing up!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and flattering fit, however you do need to go up 1-2 sizes. I'm 5'5 145 pre-pregnancy and usually in a 6, sometimes an 8 in "skinny" jean styles, but I had to get a large in these pants...and they just fit. They are a great weight and feel for spring into summer, especially since there is no full panel to overheat you! Probably going to order a second pair in white and some other colors too.
customer_reviews.author: Rendarella

customer_reviews.title: Fits good and very cute
customer_reviews.text: Offered a bigger size as others suggested. Fits good and very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Monsey

customer_reviews.title: I bough all colors and loved them all
customer_reviews.text: I wore these throughout my entire pregnancy ... I bough all colors and loved them all !
customer_reviews.author: Melanie L Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Not for the bootylicious
customer_reviews.text: These are tight in the hips/thighs/booty. I certainly carry extra weight here when I'm pregnant, and I assume that lots of other pregnant women do too. There wasn't much stretch to the fabric, so i could not wear them. I have other Maternal America maternity pants that I do wear, so I think they just got too enthusiastic on the "skinny" part of these and didn't translate them well to maternity needs. They went back.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E Burkhart

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Got a pair of pants for my wife. Perfect fit and comfortable! That's what my wife tells me. I'm happy about the purchase. Though it was an overseas shipment, it arrived within 7 days!
customer_reviews.author: Yohei Eto

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, High Quality
customer_reviews.text: These pants are adorable and very stylish! They are made of soft, high quality material. I am 5'7", 145 lb, almost 6 months pregnant, and I ordered a large based on other reviews. They fit perfectly through the legs, but are just a bit loose in the seat/crotch. The length hits above the ankle. I am perfectly happy with them, and would order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite maternity pants
customer_reviews.text: I loved these when I was pregnant. They're super flattering. BUT, they run really small. Pre-pregnancy I wore a size 4 or 6 in pants, and weighed 130 lb and I'm 5"5'. I wore a size large in these pants. The grey looks nice with most any top.
customer_reviews.author: Dew Drop

customer_reviews.title: Beware - dye runs!
customer_reviews.text: I love MA skinny ankle jeans. However, The blue and aqua colors run badly, even in the second and third wash. I wrote to MA about this and didn't even get a "thanks for your feedback". The care instructions says wash in cold but the reality is that you need to wash in cold, separately and a few times before introducing to a normal cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday pant!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in the stage where most of my clothes still fit but I need that elastic band so the waist isn't too tight. These are a great midpoint pant without the over the belly feature but instead have a thicker sturdy band. The fabric and color is really nice and as expected. They did come tight and I almost exchanged for a size up, but after wearing for a few hours they loosened up and fit great. Unlike other maternity clothing these pants are extremely flattering and versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Justice

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bigger size XL as other reviews stated and these were way to skinny for me.
customer_reviews.author: shannon driscoll

product_meta.title: Maternal America Women's Skinny Ankle Maternity Jeans
product_meta.description: Slim fit skinny leg pants that features under belly waistband for added support.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA and Imported
Features a super soft and stretchy waistband
Under belly fit for extra comfort
Under the belly band for added support
